participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, always eager to try new experiences and connect with others.
participant_1.background: I have been dating my boyfriend for over 10 years. I am a gymnast. My favorite coffee is french vanilla. I have a black and white cat named Cow.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and reflective, with a love for storytelling and a passion for music.
participant_2.background: I did not finish college. My mother was a school music teacher. My dad was a preacher. My favorite movie is The Last of the Mohicans.

content.text: Hello! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch movies, read books, and go out to eat.
Me too! What's your favorite movie?
My favorite movie is The Last of the Mohicans.
That's a great movie! I love the scenery.
Yeah, it's beautiful. What's your favorite book?
My favorite book is The Little Prince.
I've heard of that book, but I've never read it.
You should! It's a really good book.
I will! What's your favorite thing to do when you go out to eat?
I love trying new foods. I'm always looking for new restaurants to try.
Me too! I love trying new cuisines.
What's your favorite kind of food?
I like all kinds of food, but I love Chinese food the most.
Me too! I love Chinese food. What's your favorite Chinese dish?
My favorite Chinese dish is General Tso's chicken.
That's a great dish! I love the sweet and spicy sauce.
Yeah, it's so good. I could eat it every day.
Me too! I'm so glad we have something in common.
Me too! I'm always looking for new people to share my interests with.
I'm glad we met! I'm sure we'll have a lot of fun together.
